add_subdirectory(${pybind11_SOURCE_DIR} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/pybind)
pybind11_add_module(_ase_pybinds ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bindings.cpp)
target_link_libraries(_ase_pybinds PUBLIC AriaSyntheticEnvironmentCalibrationProviderLib)
